# Professional API Automation Framework
> **A comprehensive API testing framework showcasing modern DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and industry-standard automation techniques**
[![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/build-passing-brightgreen)](https://github.com/yourusername/API-Automation-Framework) [![Docker](https://img.shields.io/badge/docker-enabled-blue)](https://hub.docker.com/) [![Java](https://img.shields.io/badge/java-17-orange)](https://www.oracle.com/java/) [![Maven](https://img.shields.io/badge/maven-3.6.3+-red)](https://maven.apache.org/) [![TestNG](https://img.shields.io/badge/testng-7.7.1-yellow)](https://testng.org/)
## Purpose & Vision
This repository represents my journey in mastering **API Test Automation** and **DevOps Engineering**. Built to demonstrate real-world industry practices, this framework serves as:
- **Learning Portfolio**: Showcasing continuous skill development in automation testing - **Professional Showcase**: Demonstrating expertise for career advancement opportunities - **Industry Standards**: Following best practices used in top-tier companies - **Career Catalyst**: Designed to impress hiring managers and technical interviewers
## ✨ Key Achievements & Highlights
### **Technical Excellence** - ✅ **Complete CI/CD Pipeline**: GitHub → Jenkins → Docker → Automated Reports - ✅ **Webhook Integration**: Real-time GitHub triggers via ngrok tunneling - ✅ **Dockerized Testing**: Containerized test execution with Docker Hub integration - ✅ **Data-Driven Testing**: Excel-based test data management with dynamic parameterization - ✅ **Intelligent Reporting**: ExtentReports with timestamped HTML reports and logs - ✅ **Retry Mechanism**: Automated test retry logic for flaky test scenarios - ✅ **Cross-Environment**: Properties-based configuration for multiple environments
### ️ **Architecture & Design** - ✅ **Page Object Model**: Scalable and maintainable test structure - ✅ **Modular Framework**: Reusable components and utilities - ✅ **Log4j2 Integration**: Comprehensive logging with different log levels - ✅ **Maven Build Management**: Dependency management and build automation - ✅ **TestNG Test Management**: Parallel execution, grouping, and prioritization
## ️ Tech Stack & Tools
| Category | Technology | Purpose | |----------|------------|---------| | **Language** | Java 17+ | Core development language | | **Build Tool** | Maven 3.6.3+ | Dependency & build management | | **Testing Framework** | TestNG | Test execution & management | | **API Testing** | REST Assured | API automation & validation | | **Reporting** | ExtentReports | Rich HTML test reports | | **Logging** | Log4j2 | Comprehensive logging system | | **CI/CD** | Jenkins | Automated build & deployment | | **Containerization** | Docker & Docker Hub | Isolated test environments | | **Tunneling** | ngrok | Local Jenkins exposure for webhooks | | **Version Control** | Git & GitHub | Source code management | | **Data Management** | Apache POI | Excel-based test data |
## ️ Project Architecture
``` API-Automation-Framework/ ├── Dockerfile # Container configuration ├── Jenkinsfile # CI/CD pipeline definition ├── pom.xml # Maven dependencies & plugins ├── testng.xml # Test suite configuration ├── testData/ # Excel test data files │ └── UserData.xlsx ├── src/ │ ├── main/java/ # Core framework utilities │ └── test/java/api/ │ ├── endpoints/ # API endpoint definitions │ │ ├── Routes.java # URL route constants │ │ ├── UserEndpoints.java # API method implementations │ │ └── UserEndpointsPropertiesFile.java │ ├── payload/ # Request/Response POJOs │ │ └── User.java │ ├── tests/ # Test classes │ │ ├── UserTests.java # Individual API tests │ │ └── DDTests.java # Data-driven tests │ └── ️ utilities/ # Helper utilities │ ├── ExtentReportManager.java │ ├── DataProviders.java │ ├── RetryAnalyzer.java │ └── XLUtility.java ├── logs/ # Auto-generated log files ├── reports/ # HTML test reports └── target/ # Maven build artifacts ```
## CI/CD Pipeline Flow
```mermaid graph LR A[GitHub Push] --> B[Webhook Trigger] B --> C[ngrok Tunnel] C --> D[Jenkins Pipeline] D --> E[Docker Build] E --> F[Test Execution] F --> G[Report Generation] G --> H[Docker Hub Push] H --> I[Notification] ```
### Pipeline Features: 1. ** Automated Triggers**: GitHub webhooks via ngrok for instant builds 2. ** Docker Integration**: Containerized test execution environment 3. ** Live Reporting**: Real-time HTML reports accessible via Jenkins 4. ** Log Management**: Timestamped logs with different verbosity levels 5. ** Hub Deployment**: Automated Docker image push to Docker Hub 6. ** Notifications**: Build status notifications and failure alerts
## Professional Skills Demonstrated
### **SDET/QA Engineer Skills:** - API Testing Strategy & Implementation - Test Framework Architecture & Design - Data-Driven Testing Methodologies - Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment - Docker Containerization for Testing - Log Analysis & Debugging Techniques
### **DevOps Engineering Skills:** - Jenkins Pipeline as Code - Docker Multi-stage Builds - Webhook Configuration & Management - Infrastructure as Code Practices - Automated Report Publishing - Environment Configuration Management
### **Software Development Skills:** - Object-Oriented Programming (Java) - Design Patterns Implementation - Maven Build Management - Git Workflow & Best Practices - Code Organization & Documentation - Exception Handling & Retry Logic
## Learning Outcomes & Growth
This project represents my commitment to continuous learning and professional development:
### **Technical Growth:** - Mastered modern API testing frameworks and tools - Implemented industry-standard CI/CD practices - Gained hands-on experience with containerization - Developed expertise in test automation architecture
### **Professional Development:** - Enhanced problem-solving and debugging skills - Improved understanding of DevOps culture and practices - Strengthened ability to work with complex technical stacks - Developed skills in technical documentation and presentation
## Getting Started
### Prerequisites - Java 17+ installed - Maven 3.6.3+ configured - Docker installed and running - Jenkins server setup (optional for local runs)
### Quick Start ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/yourusername/API-Automation-Framework.git
# Navigate to project directory cd API-Automation-Framework
# Run tests locally mvn clean test
# Build Docker image docker build -t api-automation-framework .
# Run tests in Docker container docker run --rm api-automation-framework ```
### Jenkins Setup with Webhooks 1. **Setup ngrok**: `ngrok http 8080` (expose local Jenkins) 2. **Configure Webhook**: Add ngrok URL to GitHub repository settings 3. **Jenkins Pipeline**: Import Jenkinsfile for automated builds 4. **Docker Integration**: Configure Docker Hub credentials in Jenkins
## Reports & Logging
- ** ExtentReports**: Rich HTML reports with screenshots and logs - ** Log4j2**: Structured logging with different levels (INFO, DEBUG, ERROR) - **⏰ Timestamped Artifacts**: All reports and logs include execution timestamps - ** Jenkins Integration**: Reports accessible directly from Jenkins dashboard
## Career Impact & Next Steps
This framework demonstrates my readiness for senior-level positions in: - **SDET/QA Automation Engineer** roles - **DevOps Engineer** positions - **Software Development Engineer in Test** opportunities - **Technical Lead** positions in automation teams
### **Continuous Improvement:** - Expanding test coverage with additional API endpoints - Adding cross-browser UI testing capabilities - ☁️ Implementing cloud-based test execution (AWS/Azure) - Integrating with test management tools (TestRail, Zephyr) - Adding security testing components (OWASP ZAP)
## Connect & Collaborate
I'm actively seeking opportunities to bring this expertise to innovative teams and challenging projects. This repository showcases not just technical skills, but also the dedication to quality, continuous learning, and professional growth that drives successful careers in technology.
---
** "Automation is not just about running tests; it's about building confidence in software quality through intelligent, scalable, and maintainable solutions."**
---
⭐ **If this project demonstrates the kind of technical expertise and professional approach you're looking for in your next hire, let's connect!**
